about_the_game:
Customize the interior of your house with 5 fabulous designs! You'll also be able to upgrade your hoe, watering can, hammer, axe, and fishing rod an additional level, making growing crops, fishing, and mining easier and faster!

• Additional level for all of your tools!
• 5 Different Interior Design Sets: Farm, Castle, Steampunk, Spaceship, and Starlight!
detailed_description:
Customize the interior of your house with 5 fabulous designs! You'll also be able to upgrade your hoe, watering can, hammer, axe, and fishing rod an additional level, making growing crops, fishing, and mining easier and faster!

• Additional level for all of your tools!
• 5 Different Interior Design Sets: Farm, Castle, Steampunk, Spaceship, and Starlight!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-8265U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) UHD Graphics620

short_description: Customize the interior of your house with 5 fabulous designs! You'll also be able to upgrade your hoe, watering can, hammer, axe, and fishing rod an additional level, making growing crops, fishing, and mining easier and faster!
supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, German
